clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Small pneumothorax on the right upper lobe side.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in right upper lobe.
Focal consolidation in right upper lobe with air bronchogram.
Bronchiectatic changes in right upper lobe region.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 14 mm in diameter.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
